column4: Question: Nvidia Graphics card, currenting using Vesa drivers but DisplayConfig-gtk doesn't see my DVI Monitor, only VGA, anywhy to resolve this without using Nvidia's drivers..?
Question: Nvidia Graphics card, currenting using Vesa drivers but DisplayConfig-gtk doesn't see my DVI Monitor, only VGA, anywhy to resolve this without using Nvidia's drivers..?
not that i know of. I have noticed that on a few of my systems. if i power up with  only one monitor plugged in  - that one becomes the 'default
but thats not much of a fix. :)
